CustomField.description: Additional remarks or special provision information. Additional information that may be required by regulation about a hazardous material, such as, “Limited Quantity”, DOT-SP numbers, EX numbers
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Additional remarks or special provision information. Additional information that may be required by regulation about a hazardous material, such as, “Limited Quantity”, DOT-SP numbers, EX numbers
CustomField.label: Additional Description
